Author: TheAdjunctTavore
Text: I can as well. Except s soon as I eat a decent amount they appear within hours.

Author: scarletfawn
Text: OMG FINALLY SOMEONE WHO CAN DO IT TOO. My periods are so sensitive to restricting that they're just gone right away if I avoid eating around a certain time of the month. That's why I had my periods last time back in recovery... Somehow I'm scared of what missing my periods means for my hormonal balance etc but I also don't want them back cause Idk it's sort of rewarding? Like actual proof I'm really trying to lose weight and in an "unhealthy way"
